cast.overview: A story centered around an Indian family who moves to France and opens a restaurant across the street from a Michelin-starred French restaurant.
cast.title: The Hundred-Foot Journey

details.biography: Aria Pandya is 10 years old and attends E.S.T.A (Education in Stage and Theatre Arts) in London,the London theatre school that is the brainchild of former international casting director/producer Esta Charkham. Aria has been with the school for three years and her work there includes Seussical The Musical, and Bugsy Malone. Aria lives in West London with her parents and The Hundred-Foot Journey is her professional debut.  - IMDb Mini Biography By: Punita Pandya/Manager
details.name: Aria Pandya
